CustomField.description: The value of this field will be updated with the Account's Billing Postal Code or Contact's Mailing Postal Code, based on "Entity" if not defined on record entry.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The value of this field will be updated with the Account's Billing Postal Code or Contact's Mailing Postal Code, based on "Entity" if not defined on record entry.
CustomField.label: Billing Postal Code
